code: import{configureStore,createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var userslice=createSlice({name:'user',initialState:{user:null},reducers:{login:function login(state,action){state.user=action.payload;},logout:function logout(state){state.user=null;}}});var _userslice$actions=userslice.actions,login=_userslice$actions.login,logout=_userslice$actions.logout;export{login,logout};export var selectuser=function selectuser(state){return state.user;};var store=configureStore({reducer:userslice.reducer});export default store;
